question.title: Configure Kubernetes services of Spring Cloud Dataflow streams
question.body:
When Spring Cloud Dataflow deploys a stream, it delegates the actual deployment to Spring Cloud Skipper. Effectively, it is possible to configure Skipper to customize the Kubernetes deployment, using this configuration properties. Yet, with the same properties, it is not possible to customize the Kubernetes service.

How is it possible to configure the Kubernetes service? Is it created during stream definition, but I'm unsure if it is generated by Skipper or directly by the Spring Cloud Dataflow server. In particular, I'm interested in having multiple ports exposed in the service.
